headline: Surging Permian Revenues and Export Plans Might Change the Case for Investing in Targa Resources (TRGP)
summary: Earlier this week, Targa Resources reported strong second-quarter results with total revenue up 20% and net income more than doubling from the previous year, while reaffirming 2025 guidance and advancing plans to expand LPG export capacity to 19 million barrels per month by 2027. These developments reflect Targa's ability to leverage stable fee-based contracts and disciplined capital allocation, which have materially enhanced shareholder returns over the past five years. We'll examine how...
